title: Wits End with Devourer's Shyvana seems so nice right now.
body: No idea why I haven't been seeing it, I think it is now a core item for her if you are building Devourer's instead of Cinderhulk - it used to be a great item for her then item Changes and Blade of the Ruined King's release gave her a better option/changed her options and I think now with Sated Devourer it should be a buy for her in every game where there is a little magic damage or if it helps allies or if they are unlikely to be building Magic Resist.

replies.body: You could always try both at once but you are losing out of the tank stuff Shyvvie needs to actually be herself. If you want to do those items, try AP Xin Zhao with the new Zeke's item. I don't play him but I did the math and it is seriously messed up. Nerf bat going to hit him like a truck if people start picking him up.

devourer pretty much is wits end, both 50% atk speed and on hit magic damage. i dont think its effective to have both at once. with the 2nd passive you have to get off auto attacks before you can take advantage of the MR reduction, but usually with shyvs 0 cc kit she will use her burnout and/or ulti to reach an enemy leaving her to only use her E for slightly stronger damage. the MR and 2nd passive doesnt help with jungle clear, which can make the difference since her insane clear speed will be slightly hindered causing her to ultimately be less of a threat through presence on the map. id stick to just devourer bork into tank, possibly with hydra or bt but she will be too squishy for too long leaving a considerable window to cc and 1 shot her by that time
